about_the_game:
Use thermals to stay in the air.


Steer clear of rainy clouds.


Take a selfie at famous sites.


Land before your bus leaves.


Compete with other players for time, speed, and accuracy via leaderboards.


Note from the developer
I'm a cross-country paraglider from Bavaria. In this game, I wanted to captue the fun of flying cross-country, accessible for a wider gaming audience.

While it does have many realistic aspects of steering a glider, thermalling, and how thermal clouds cycle on and off, I erred on the arcade rather than the hyper-realistic simulation.

Real clouds don't pop with a satisfying "bing" sound when you touch them. I've touched many.

The game also tends to have more action than a real flight, which most of the time, feels pretty zen.

If you never had the chance to fly a paraglider, it's a bit like hiking, but from the comfort of a hammock. And with the most spectacular view.

I hope this game gets some of you interested in flying. And fills some idle ground time for my fellow pilots.

Enjoy and save landings!

short_description: Panda & Crow is a fun Third-Person Arcade Game where you play a paragliding panda. Use thermals to stay in the air, steer clear of rainy clouds, and hurry from site to site and take a selfie before your tour bus leaves!
